description.zh-cn: 中华民国国民政府于1947年公布的中国东北地区行政区划划分方案，因国共内战从未完全施行。
description.en: An administrative division plan for Northeast China announced by the Nationalist Government of the Republic of China in 1947, which was never fully implemented due to the Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国在训政时期的中央政府与最高行政机关。
description.en: The central government and highest administrative body of the Republic of China during the political tutelage period.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党与中国共产党之间在中国境内爆发的内战。
description.en: A civil war in China fought between the Kuomintang (KMT) and the Chinese Communist Party (CCP).

description.zh-cn: 日本关东军在中国东北蓄意制造并发动的一场侵华战争，是日本帝国主义侵华的开端。
description.en: An invasion of China deliberately staged by the Japanese Kwantung Army in Northeast China, marking the beginning of the Japanese imperialist invasion of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国初期对东北地区辽宁、吉林、黑龙江三个省级行政区的合称。
description.en: A collective term for the three provincial-level administrative regions of Liaoning, Jilin, and Heilongjiang in Northeast China during the early Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1931年九一八事变后，由日本在中国东北地区扶植建立的傀儡政权。
description.en: A puppet state established and supported by Japan in Northeast China after the Mukden Incident in 1931.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪30年代至40年代，中华民国抵抗大日本帝国侵略的全面战争。
description.en: A full-scale war fought between the Republic of China and the Empire of Japan from the 1930s to the 1940s.

nodes.id: 收复东北各省处理办法纲要

zh-cn: 收复东北各省处理办法纲要

description.zh-cn: 1945年8月国民政府制定的纲要，规定将东北三省重新划分为九省。
description.en: An outline formulated by the Nationalist Government in August 1945, which stipulated the re-division of the three northeastern provinces into nine provinces.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任立法院院长，其选区为辽北省。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who served as the President of the Legislative Yuan. His constituency was Liaobei Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，民主进步党创党人之一，其在立法院的选区为辽宁省。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China and one of the founders of the Democratic Progressive Party. His constituency in the Legislative Yuan was Liaoning Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国主要政党之一。
description.en: One of the major political parties in the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的最高立法机关。
description.en: The supreme legislative body of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国东北九省之一。
description.en: One of the Nine Northeastern Provinces of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国东北九省之一。
description.en: One of the Nine Northeastern Provinces of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 指中华民国政府有效统治中国大陆的时期。
description.en: Refers to the period when the government of the Republic of China effectively ruled mainland China.

description.zh-cn: 于民国36年（1947年）6月5日公布了东北九省行政区划划分方案。
description.en: Announced the administrative division plan of the Nine Northeastern Provinces on June 5, 1947.

description.zh-cn: 由于国共内战，东北九省的行政区划方案从未完全施行。
description.en: Due to the Chinese Civil War, the administrative division plan of the Nine Northeastern Provinces was never fully implemented.

description.zh-cn: 九一八事变后，日本占领中国东北，并于次年扶植建立了满洲国。
description.en: After the Mukden Incident, Japan occupied Northeast China and subsequently established the puppet state of Manchukuo the following year.

description.zh-cn: 在日本的扶植之下建立满洲国。
description.en: Manchukuo was established under the support of Japan.

description.zh-cn: 满洲国将原东三省地区分成18个行省进行统治，使得原东三省建制名存实亡。
description.en: Manchukuo divided the original Three Northeastern Provinces into 18 provinces for governance, causing the original provincial system to exist in name only.

description.zh-cn: 中国抗日战争胜利后，满洲国随之瓦解。
description.en: After the victory of the Second Sino-Japanese War, Manchukuo collapsed.

relationships.target: 收复东北各省处理办法纲要

description.zh-cn: 于1945年8月制定了《收复东北各省处理办法纲要》。
description.en: Formulated the 'Outline for the Handling of the Recovery of the Northeastern Provinces' in August 1945.

relationships.source: 收复东北各省处理办法纲要

description.zh-cn: 该纲要规定将东北三省重新划分为九省，是东北九省方案的法律基础。
description.en: This outline stipulated the re-division of the three northeastern provinces into nine, forming the legal basis for the Nine Northeastern Provinces plan.

description.zh-cn: 抗战胜利后，苏联支援大批的中国共产党行政人员与中国人民解放军进入东北进行接收。
description.en: After the victory of the war, the Soviet Union supported a large number of CCP administrators and PLA forces to enter Northeast China for takeover.

description.zh-cn: 苏联红军在东北的驻军及对中共的支持，阻碍了国民政府对东北的接收。
description.en: The presence of the Soviet Red Army in Northeast China and its support for the CCP hindered the Nationalist Government's takeover of the region.

description.zh-cn: 梁肃戎曾任立法院院长，其选举区域为辽北省。
description.en: Liang Su-yung served as the President of the Legislative Yuan, with his constituency being Liaobei Province.

description.zh-cn: 费希平为辽宁省选出的立法委员。
description.en: Fei Hsi-ping was a legislator elected from Liaoning Province.

description.zh-cn: 费希平是民主进步党创党人之一。
description.en: Fei Hsi-ping was one of the founders of the Democratic Progressive Party.
